original_quote: Inertia matrices are crucial for analyzing the three-dimensional rotational behavior of celestial bodies.
reason: This quote introduces the concept of inertia matrices related to celestial bodies. A visual representation of an inertia matrix application to a 3D object would clarify its significance.
description: An image of a 3D object (like an asteroid) with an inertia matrix overlay and axes, demonstrating its rotation behavior with labels directing attention to the principal axes.
